name: INVITE_DELETE
description: Sent when an invite to a channel is deleted.
scopeNote: Guild scope for guild invites (MANAGE_CHANNELS permission required), presence scope for group DM invites (sent to all recipients)

code.description: The invite code that was deleted

channel_id.description: Channel ID the invite was for (present for guild and group DM invites)

guild_id.description: Guild ID (present for guild invites only)
